summary: Comprehensive testing of Styx Cafe Management System completed. Fixed critical auth modal backdrop issue. Admin panel URL redirection issue identified but not resolved due to browser automation tool limitations.

critical_bugs.issue: SMS service configuration error - Parameter 'sid' is not valid
critical_bugs.impact: Customer login via OTP completely broken

critical_bugs.issue: SMS service configuration error - Parameter 'sid' is not valid

data_validation_issues.issue: Requires valid ObjectId for cafe field, test data rejected

Duplicate contact validation working but prevents testing

ui_bugs.issue: Backdrop overlay blocking user interactions after modal opens

integration_issues.issue: URLs http://localhost:3001/admin/login and http://localhost:3001/superadmin/login redirect to customer website

passed_tests: Customer Login modal opens and closes
List Your Court page loads with complete form
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. CRITICAL: Fix SMS service configuration (Twilio 'sid' parameter) for OTP functionality. 2. CRITICAL: Investigate admin panel URL redirection issue - admin panel URLs redirect to customer website instead of loading admin panel. 3. Configure proper cafe ObjectIds for customer registration testing.
